code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Popup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Popup=()=>{const[visible,setVisible]=useState(false);const[position,setPosition]=useState({top:'0px',left:'0px'});useEffect(()=>{const showPopup=()=>{console.log('Show Popup');setPosition({top:"".concat(Math.floor(Math.random()*(window.innerHeight-100)),"px"),left:"".concat(Math.floor(Math.random()*(window.innerWidth-300)),"px")});setVisible(true);setTimeout(()=>setVisible(false),15000);};showPopup();const intervalId=setInterval(showPopup,60000);return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[]);return visible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup",style:{top:position.top,left:position.left},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"popup-title",children:"!Feliz Navidad!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"popup-subtitle",children:"aprovecha ahora las mejores ofertas"})]});};export default Popup;
